alert.note: Alert for Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:35PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Madison and central Gallatin Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 332 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of thunderstorms extending from near Virginia city east to Ennis and Big Sky. These cells were moving northeast at 30 mph and producing wind gusts in excess of 40 mph along with occasional lightning and brief rainfall. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ennis, Jeffers, Big Sky, Cameron and Mcallister. This includes the following highways... Highway 191 between mile markers 31 and 75. Highway 287 between mile markers 38 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
